heading: HR01353
0: RESOLUTION RESPECTFULLY URGING HIS EXCELLENCY, PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE TO NOMINATE MIRIAM DEFENSOR SANTIAGO FOR CONFERMENT OF THE QUEZON SERVICE CROSS, IN RECOGNITION OF HER EXEMPLARY CONTRIBUTION TO THE NATION THROUGH A LIFE DEDICATED TO PUBLIC SERVICE

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01353
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION RESPECTFULLY URGING HIS EXCELLENCY, PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE TO NOMINATE MIRIAM DEFENSOR SANTIAGO FOR CONFERMENT OF THE QUEZON SERVICE CROSS, IN RECOGNITION OF HER EXEMPLARY CONTRIBUTION TO THE NATION THROUGH A LIFE DEDICATED TO PUBLIC SERVICE
